question: 減俸
sourceMnemonic: Your boss says she's going to <kanji>decrease</kanji> your <kanji>salary</kanji> with a company-wide <vocabulary>salary reduction</vocabulary>. You should probably start looking for a new job that won't do <vocabulary>salary cut</vocabulary>s like this.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. Watch out because <ja>ほう</ja> becomes <ja>ぽう</ja> here.
